entry.title: 4 Pack | Clear Resin Transparent Chiavari Chair, Armless Stackable Chairs
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Furniture
Price: 299.99

[About]

Quantity: 4 Chiavari Chairs
Material: Acrylic | Resin
Color: Clear
Style: Transparent Assembly Chiavari Chair
Weight Capacity: 400lbs

What you get:

  • 4 Chairs
  • Each Chair in 4 Parts + Bag of accessories
    Total Chair Measurement:
    • Total Size: 17"L x 36"H
    • Height (Seat to Top): 19"
    • Height (Seat to Bottom): 17.5"
    • Seat Size: 16"L x 16"W
    UV treated to prevent fading and discoloration
    Scratch and Water Resistant
    Non-Stick and Anti-Static Finish
    Assembly Required: Yes
    Assembly Instruction: Not included. Easy to Assemble
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Other Measurements:

    Chair Parts:

    • Back: 36"L x 16"
    • Bottom: 17"L x 15"W
    • Legs:
      • Overall Length: 13.25
      • Overall Top/Base Oval Size: 0.75"L x 0.5"W
    • Seat: 16"L x 15"W

    Bag of Parts:

    • (8x) Long Flat-Tipped Screws
      • Length: 1.25"L
      • Top/Bottom Diameter: 1cm | 0.5cm
    • (5x) Short Sharp-Tipped Screws
      • Length: 0.75"
      • Top/Neck Diameter: 0.75cm | 3mm
    • (8x) Screw Covers
      • Diameter Size: 0.5"

    Additional Information:

      • This chair can be stacked up to five chairs high
      • Ideal indoor or outdoor seating solution
      • Transparent, crystal finish and classic chiavari design
      • Lightweight, transparent design is great for special events like weddings or catered events
      • Ships unassembled (easy to assemble)

entry.title: Natural Jute Burlap Chair Slipcover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2150
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 3.99 - 159.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Slipcover 
Material: Jute Burlap
Color: Natural
Top to Bottom Height: 36"
Square Top: 17" wide
Front Covering: 20" height x 17" width
Back Covering: Approximately 25.75" will be covered by the fabric
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

This rustic burlap slipcover will elicit that countryside charm and tranquility to your event, while still keeping the contemporary standards of your voguish taste intact with its natural organic fibers. The robust material will handle the roughness of natural surroundings and will look extra classy if accented with white linen and fine china. The natural material blends stupendously with the lovely natural hue of green grass, brown tree trunks, and blue skies.
Made with sturdy fabric and styled for a charming appeal. These 100% burlap slipcovers will fuse nature with celebration and thus will ooze the oodles of tranquil ecstasy that is found so rarely in most of the indoor events. Perfect for your rustic-theme and burlap-theme celebrations.
Our stylish burlap chair slipcover features a natural burlap hue and pretty white lace accent in the center. This simple, yet classy jute chair slipcover can be accentuated with chair and table accents with more contemporary and earthly tones or pure white chair and table decorations and fine chinaware.

Additional Information:

  • Designed for Chivari style chairs only. Not for folding or banquet styles.
  • How to Care: Dry Clean only.
  • Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
  • The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: White Organza Chiavari Chair Covers | Chair Slipcovers with Satin Embroidery
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2150
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 2.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Slipcover
Material: Organza w/ Satin Embroidery
Color: White
Height: 35"
Width: 15"
Edge: Serged
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer
Note: Designed for Chivari style chairs only. Not for folding or banquet styles.
﻿All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Add a dash of elegant sophistication into your wedding with these delicately fashioned see-thru organza chair slipcovers accented with the standout nature of satin and stunning leaf-motif embroidery. Pair with our satin or organza chair covers, polyester table covers, table runners, and linens to complete your event's perfect look.

Give your lackluster party chairs a dazzling look of delicate elegance with these glistening organza slip covers that are intricately embellished with fine satin embroider accents. Combining the lush luster of silky satin with glamorous shimmer of organza, these slipcovers will instantly transform your ordinary chiavari chairs into royal seats of imperial charm.

 Additional Information:

  • Front Covering: 16" height x 15" wide of Chair front will be covered by fabric
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: Metallic Glittering Shiny Silver Spandex Stretch Chair Slipcover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2150
Type: Chair Covers
Price: 2.99 - 275.08 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Chair Cover
Material: Metallic Spandex
Color: Silver
Back of Chair: Bottom to Top: Height 35" tall. Width of Square-Top: 15" Wide
Back covering: 35" of Chair back will be covered by fabric
Front covering: 16" height x 15" wide of Chair front will be covered by fabric
Note: Designed for Chivari style chairs only. Not for folding or banquet styles.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


    [Information]

    Augment the elegance and beauty of your banquet or wedding chairs by adorning them with our splendid stretch spandex chair slipovers. Our metallic stretch spandex or Lycra chair slipovers are made from premium quality four-way stretch spandex material that features stain resistant and wrinkle-resistant properties. These highly durable and reusable spandex metallic chair slipovers are perfect for enhancing the charm of your banquet or wedding chairs for weddings, showers, banquet events, corporate parties and other festive celebrations you wish to add a little zing into.

    The impeccable sheen of metallic tone coupled with the seamless luster of spandex material will instantly ooze the oodles of glitz and glam into your party venue. These heavy duty spandex chair slipovers can be used multiple times without any need for ironing and can be laundered countless times without losing their luster and elegance. Create a perfect harmony of shine and sparkle by complementing these chair slipovers with matching spandex chair covers and sashes. Create a style statement by showcasing the glimmer and shimmer of your merriment without breaking banks.

     Additional Information: 

    • There is 1 pocket on slipcover for the 2 back chair legs
    • Chair dimensions (dimensions can be smaller but not longer as fabric can only extend so much before tearing)
    • How to Care: How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
    • Uses: Party Chair Covers, Banquet Chair Covers, Wedding Chair Covers, Dining Chair Covers
